mapper.select: select cmt_no cmtNo ,post_no postNO ,c.user_no userNo ,user_name userName ,cmt_content cmtContent ,to_char(reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') regDate from comments c, users u where c.user_no = u.user_no and post_no = (select max(post_no) from comments where user_no = (select user_no from users where id = #{id})) order by cmt_no desc
